long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tiri vault is a dapp for storing personal files on the SIA blockchain encrypted with your SIA wallet private key.
Tiri vault significantly decreases the competencies threshold for using web3 storages and opens an opportunity for non-experienced users to independently use the decentralized data storage like they have used to with web2 services.

Functions of the Tiri Vault Chrome Extension:
- provides support for the SIA storage network;
- supports safe on-chain file storage with strong encryption based on the SIA wallet private key.

To use the Tiri vault you need SC coins on your SIA wallet.
